class.name: MPAuth
class.brief_description: Middleware to check player's credentials before connecting.

members.member: Authenticate function, this must be set. Callable will be called will the following args:[br][code]plr_id[/code] The player id[br][code]credentials_data[/code] Credentials data from the player[br][code]handshake_data[/code] Handshake data from the player[br]Return false if fail, otherwise return the data
